oops, forgot these

Thu, 04/30/2009 - 00:15 | by Sham

last night i had a little freakout that i had miscounted cards. not the case! i just forgot to post a few. so here they are.

sad koi fish (aka, fluffy shrimp). this actually had a very hilarious little note in it about the sea critter on the front.

 

trees, send to a boy with trees tattooed on him.

faces and oranges.

another batch of cards

Tue, 04/28/2009 - 20:33 | by Sham

 so i posted last night, but i didn't put up every finished card i had. here are the stragglers. i grouped these together because they all started the same. i'm using cards and envelopes that i already have in my stash, and i have a lot of jadeite #10 envelopes and cement #10 cards. (those aren't green and grey? no. they're not.) after some painting and such, they are no longer all the same!

almost done

Tue, 04/28/2009 - 00:27 | by Sham

 only a few more days in the month! i am almost done with my 30 cards. i certainly haven't been sending one a day, but it looks like i have seven left. that's not too shabby. i have more to post, but i figure i'd break it up over the next few days. 

without further adieu, here are some cards that are going into the mailbox tomorrow morning:

tree card for my beloved hippie cousin. (tree is cut out of recycled paper!)

Procrastination, because it's nothing new.

Fri, 04/10/2009 - 21:18 | by Sham

today is my birthday, and that means we are ten days into the month of april. up to this point, i've only mailed four cards, but i'll be making up for it this weekend, and trying to match the date to the number of sent mail pieces.
